'''Character EXP''' is used by [[Characters]] to increase their level. It is primarily obtained by using [[Character EXP Materials]]. Killing [[enemies]] while [[exploration|exploring]] the open world gives a very small amount, based on enemy levels and type. Claiming [[Ley Line Blossom]]s from [[Bosses]] also yield some Character EXP.

Character EXP gained from [[quests]], defeating enemies, and claiming Boss rewards is given to each member of your party, regardless of participation. Dead party members ''will'' still receive Character EXP. Characters not in your active party will not receive Character EXP.

Using character EXP materials costs 1 [[Mora]] for every 5 points of Character EXP.

==Leveling Characters==
The table below lists the Character EXP required for a [[character]] to level up. Keep in mind a character's max level is increased every time they are [[Characters#Ascensions|ascended]].
